Sentencas: The global experience gained all these years in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) development has prompted for a change from the state of the art functional electrolyte material, yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), having a conductivity of 0.1 S cm(-1) at 1000 degrees C, to a new material which exhibits equivalent conductivity values in the intermediate temperature range (600-700 degrees C).
